info: This directory will contain preprocessed JSON/GeoJSON files generated by the scripts/ preprocessor.
files: stops.geojson - GeoJSON FeatureCollection of all transit stops
routes.geojson - GeoJSON FeatureCollection of route shapes
timetable.json - Schedule data: stop_id → route_id → {weekday, weekend}
instructions: Run 'python scripts/main.py' to generate these files from GTFS data.
